channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Essay challenge: ChatGPT vs students
item.description: Researchers have been putting ChatGPT essays to the test against real students. A new study reveals that the AI generated essays don't yet live up to ...

item.title: Ptero firma: Footprints pinpoint when ancient flying reptiles conquered the ground

item.title: Seasonal changes affect alcohol tolerance and your waistline
item.description: Researchers have found that drug effectiveness, alcohol tolerance, and carbohydrate metabolism change with the seasons. Their findings are based on a ...

item.title: Breast cancer mortality in women ages 20-49 significantly dropped between 2010 and 2020
item.description: Breast cancer deaths among women ages 20-49 declined significantly between 2010 and 2020, according to a new study.
